detail_desc: Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Soft suede sandals with straps that tie around the leg and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 12.5 cm.
Skirt in stretch fabric with a visible zip at one side and concealed elastication at the waist.

Set with a top and joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems. T-shirt with narrow ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and lacing at the sides.
Double-breasted coat in felted fabric with a collar and decorative stitching front and back. Decorative flaps at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Lined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a high polo neck, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.
Straight-cut coat in soft imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No fasteners.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a pair of short sports tights. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the shorts is recycled.

Lightly padded jacket in a rustle weave with a hood that has a faux fur trim that can be folded back and fastened with press-studs. Zip down the front, sewn-on belt at the waist with a metal fastener at the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Balaclava in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with sewn-on ears at the top. Jersey lining.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Vest top in soft, printed jersey with an asymmetric hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.
Hat in a soft knit with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

prod_name: Beverly HW Loose Mom Fit Dnm
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Lined bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, satin linings and cork wedge heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 11 cm.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with a strap and tassels at the front. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short poncho in a soft, fine-knit cashmere blend with a ribbed polo neck that has a slit at one side.
Top in soft, airy slub jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.
Cropped top in jersey with a soft brushed finish. Round neckline, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Trims around the neckline and cuffs.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Plastic water bottle with a snap-on lid and spout and a removable, adjustable fabric carry strap. Capacity 450 ml.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and patterned soles.

Shirt in stretch Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Wide blouse in a patterned, viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.

Soft, non-wired lace bras with lined cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication under the bust and a wide lace hem. No fasteners.
Sleeveless top in an airy weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Flared style with longer sides. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled viscose weave. Short sleeves with smocked trims and smocking at the top and hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Blouse in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a rounded collar, sewn-on ties at the top and buttons down the front. Yoke at the front with a frill trim that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned, frill-trimmed cuffs.

Shirt in an airy weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping, woven Tencel™ lyocell blend with a square neckline and flutter sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders. Open section at the back with wide ties at the back and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back. Flared, softly draping skirt. Soft cotton voile lining over the bust.

Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a scalloped neckline. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with pleats at the top. Lined.

Set with a dress, gilet and tights. Dress in a patterned weave with buttons down the back, a gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Faux fur gilet with a concealed button at the top. Lined. Fine-knit tights in a cotton blend.

Fully lined bikini. Triangle top with a decorative bow at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms with bows at one side.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a straight hem.

Zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.

Blouse in a slub cotton weave with a small stand-up collar in lace and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lace details at the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in imitation leather with a collar, press-studs down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, flap front pockets, long sleeves and cuffs with press-studs. Lined.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Mid waist with gathered elastication and a small frill trim, and a high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.

Dress in soft cotton jersey with a sewn-in bodysuit. Dress with short raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and a skirt in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Press-studs at the crotch. The cotton content of the dress is partly organic.

Coat in a sturdy weave containing some wool with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Concealed pockets in the side seams, a soft, detachable belt with a metal buckle, and a single back vent. Lined.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in airy, patterned viscose crêpe with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and short sleeves with a tie detail. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with pleats at the top and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Knitted jacket with a soft, thermal fleece inside. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Trousers in soft, patterned, thermal fleece with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Hi-top trainers in canvas with lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour side panels. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
DESMOND & DEMPSEY x H&M. Short, V-neck dress in an airy linen and viscose weave with gathered shoulder seams, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Pyjamas with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Shirt with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Rib-knit hat in a double layer of soft cotton with an appliqué on the sewn-in turned-up hem.
